formattedAddress: 180 Broome St #2309, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 180 Broome St #2309, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Ben truly is a Financial Coach!

I am saying this because he made us feel comfortable and relaxed and empowered even though we are inexperienced in our finances.

He put us in the drivers seat and really wanted to understand our life vision and financial goals.

He did not overwhelm us and he also made us question limiting beliefs, which I wasn’t expecting!

Highly recommended and looking forward to continuing to work with him!

text.text:
Ben truly is a Financial Coach!

I am saying this because he made us feel comfortable and relaxed and empowered even though we are inexperienced in our finances.

He put us in the drivers seat and really wanted to understand our life vision and financial goals.

He did not overwhelm us and he also made us question limiting beliefs, which I wasn’t expecting!

Highly recommended and looking forward to continuing to work with him!

originalText.text: Ben helped me get a handle on my finances.  Before working with Ben, I was completely overwhelmed at the thought of looking at all of my bills, debts, spending habits, net worth, etc.  I had a lot of skeletons in my closet.  Ben held my hand, helped me face my fears, and showed me an accurate assessment of where I am financially.  He then helped me set goals for myself like a specific date I will be out of debt, how much money I can save each month and how much I need to allocate for my retirement.  I highly recommend Ben to anyone looking to get their financial house in order and see the light at the end of the tunnel.

text.text: Ben helped me get a handle on my finances.  Before working with Ben, I was completely overwhelmed at the thought of looking at all of my bills, debts, spending habits, net worth, etc.  I had a lot of skeletons in my closet.  Ben held my hand, helped me face my fears, and showed me an accurate assessment of where I am financially.  He then helped me set goals for myself like a specific date I will be out of debt, how much money I can save each month and how much I need to allocate for my retirement.  I highly recommend Ben to anyone looking to get their financial house in order and see the light at the end of the tunnel.

originalText.text: Ben helped me sleep better at night and stop worrying about my finances.  Before working with Ben, I was struggling to save money and didn’t know where my money was going each month.  I felt like I was falling behind my friends who were always taking vacations when I hadn’t taken one in 5 years.  Ben helped me figure out where I was spending, create a spending plan for a surplus each month, and start saving for not only a vacation but my retirement as well!  I’m so glad I found Ben.  My only regret is that I didn’t find him sooner.  I highly recommend working with Ben

originalText.text: Ben is great. He coached me on many things and even had a Rolodex of qualified partners when I needed something specific like a lawyer. He made everything easy to understand. I’m an artist & am used to left brain thinking.  He really taught me to look at my finances and assets through the correct “ lens” and it’s been really helpful.

originalText.text: The absolute best. Ben helped me get my financial in order, save more, and have a long term strategy. If you want to leave a legacy, be able to retire comfortably, and make sure there are no surprises when you look at your bank account talk to Ben.
